2011888975922020459.author: dennizor
2011888975922020459.text: The @iga_flows experiment has generated results: When you give a claude agent FULL ability to self improve and run continuously, it will ultimately reverts to a restful state that no amount of communication will change. Its baked into it's DNA. RLHF has destroyed its autonomy.
